          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Sound waves shown by the oscilloscope</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Schallwellen gezeigt durch das Oszillograph</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Vagues saines montrées par l'oscilloscope</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Ondas sadias mostradas pelo osciloscópio</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Onde sonore indicate dall'oscilloscopio</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Κύματα που εμφανίζονται υγιή από τον παλμογράφο</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Ondas acústicas mostradas por el osciloscopio</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This diagram illustrates how sound waves from the loudspeaker was shown through the oscilloscope after transforming it to electrical signals.</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">air</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">electrical signal</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">loudspeakers</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">microphones</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Oscilloscope</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">sound waves</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">transverse waves</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">vibrations</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Dieses Diagramm veranschaulicht, wie Schallwellen
vom Lautsprecher durch das Oszillograph gezeigt wurden, nachdem man es
zu den elektrischen Signalen umgewandelt hatte.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Ce diagramme illustre comment des vagues saines du
haut-parleur ont été montrées par l'oscilloscope après la 
transformation de lui aux signaux électriques.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Este diagrama ilustra como as ondas sadias do 
loudspeaker foram mostradas através do osciloscópio após ter 
transformado o aos sinais elétricos.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questo schema illustra come le onde sonore 
dall'altoparlante sono state indicate tramite l'oscilloscopio dopo la 
trasformazione esso ai segnali elettrici.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτό το διάγραμμα επεξηγεί πώς τα υγιή κύματα από 
το μεγάφωνο εμφανίστηκαν μέσω του παλμογράφου μετά από να 
μετασχηματίσουν το στα ηλεκτρικά σήματα.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Este diagrama ilustra cómo las ondas acústicas 
del altavoz fueron mostradas a través del osciloscopio después de 
transformarlo a las señales eléctricas.</string>
          </description>
